How a mendicant has seen sensual pleasur: As a pit of glowing coals
How a mendicant is restrained [sn35.244:: They don't hold on to pleasant sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, or thoughts
They live with mindfulness of the body established and a limitless heart
They truly understand the freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom where those arisen bad, unskillful qualities cease without anything left over
How a mendicant is unrestrained [sn35.24: They hold on to pleasant sights, sounds, smells, tastes, touches, or thoughts
They live with mindfulness of the body unestablished and their heart restricted
They don't truly understand the freedom of heart and freedom by wisdom where those arisen bad, unskillful qualities cease without anything left over
How a mendicant conducts themselves and: They awaken to a way of conduct and a way of living such that, when they live in that way, bad, unskillful qualities of desire and grief donâ€™t overwhelm them
They quickly give up, get rid of, eliminate, and obliterate bad, unskillful memories and thoughts prone to fetters
They conduct themselves in this way and live in this way, and it's impossible for them to resign the training and return to a lesser life.
